sentences.sContent: He was jailed for 45 years for trying to blow up a plane.
sentences.sCn: 他因图谋炸飞机而被监禁了45年。

sentences.sContent: Other than blowing up a tyre I hadn't done any car maintenance.
sentences.sCn: 除了给一个轮胎充气外，我没有做过任何汽车保养。

trans.tranOther: If someone blows something up or if it blows up, it is destroyed by an explosion.
